an10.93:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an10.93:4.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati divā divassa sāvatthiyā nikkhami bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
an10.93:4.8: Yannūnāhaṃ yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyan”ti.
an10.93:5.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
an10.93:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatitthiyā paribbājakā saṅgamma samāgamma unnādino uccāsaddamahāsaddā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentā nisinnā honti.
an10.93:5.3: Addasaṃsu kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
an10.93:5.6: Ayaṃ anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati ārāmaṃ āgacchati samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako.
an10.93:5.7: Yāvatā kho pana samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā gihī odātavasanā sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasanti, ayaṃ tesaṃ aññataro anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati.
an10.93:5.8: Appasaddakāmā kho pana te āyasmanto appasaddavinītā appasaddassa vaṇṇavādino.
an10.93:5.9: Appeva nāma appasaddaṃ parisaṃ viditvā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti.
an10.93:6.1: Atha kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
an10.93:6.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.93:6.3: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ sammodi.
an10.93:6.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.93:6.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṃ:
an10.93:6.7: “Na kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sabbaṃ diṭṭhiṃ jānāmī”ti.
an10.93:7.1: “Iti kira tvaṃ, gahapati, na samaṇassa gotamassa sabbaṃ diṭṭhiṃ jānāsi;
an10.93:7.3: “Bhikkhūnampi kho ahaṃ, bhante, na sabbaṃ diṭṭhiṃ jānāmī”ti.
an10.93:8.1: “Iti kira tvaṃ, gahapati, na samaṇassa gotamassa sabbaṃ diṭṭhiṃ jānāsi napi bhikkhūnaṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhiṃ jānāsi;
an10.93:8.3: “Etaṃ kho, bhante, amhehi na dukkaraṃ byākātuṃ yaṃdiṭṭhikā mayaṃ.
an10.93:8.4: Iṅgha tāva āyasmanto yathāsakāni diṭṭhigatāni byākarontu, pacchāpetaṃ amhehi na dukkaraṃ bhavissati byākātuṃ yaṃdiṭṭhikā mayan”ti.
an10.93:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro paribbājako anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
an10.93:10.1: Aññataropi kho paribbājako anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
an10.93:11.1: Aññataropi kho paribbājako anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
an10.93:11.8: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
an10.93:11.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
an10.93:12.1: Evaṃ vutte, anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati te paribbājake etadavoca:
an10.93:12.4: evaṃdiṭṭhiko ahaṃ, gahapatī’ti, imassa ayamāyasmato diṭṭhi attano vā ayonisomanasikārahetu uppannā paratoghosapaccayā vā.
an10.93:12.5: Sā kho panesā diṭṭhi bhūtā saṅkhatā cetayitā paṭiccasamuppannā.
an10.93:12.6: Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ cetayitaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ tadaniccaṃ.
an10.93:12.8: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadeveso āyasmā allīno, tadeveso āyasmā ajjhupagato.
an10.93:13.3: evaṃdiṭṭhiko ahaṃ, gahapatī’ti, imassāpi ayamāyasmato diṭṭhi attano vā ayonisomanasikārahetu uppannā paratoghosapaccayā vā.
an10.93:13.4: Sā kho panesā diṭṭhi bhūtā saṅkhatā cetayitā paṭiccasamuppannā.
an10.93:13.5: Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ cetayitaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ tadaniccaṃ.
an10.93:13.7: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadeveso āyasmā allīno, tadeveso āyasmā ajjhupagato.
an10.93:14.8: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
an10.93:14.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
an10.93:14.10: evaṃdiṭṭhiko ahaṃ, gahapatī’ti, imassāpi ayamāyasmato diṭṭhi attano vā ayonisomanasikārahetu uppannā paratoghosapaccayā vā.
an10.93:14.11: Sā kho panesā diṭṭhi bhūtā saṅkhatā cetayitā paṭiccasamuppannā.
an10.93:14.12: Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ cetayitaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ tadaniccaṃ.
an10.93:14.14: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadeveso āyasmā allīno, tadeveso āyasmā ajjhupagato”ti.
an10.93:15.1: Evaṃ vutte te paribbājakā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavocuṃ:
an10.93:15.2: “byākatāni kho, gahapati, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakāni diṭṭhigatāni.
an10.93:15.4: “Yaṃ kho, bhante, kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ cetayitaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ tadaniccaṃ.
an10.93:15.6: ‘Yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti—
an10.93:16.1: “Yaṃ kho, gahapati, kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ cetayitaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ tadaniccaṃ.
an10.93:16.3: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadeva tvaṃ, gahapati, allīno, tadeva tvaṃ, gahapati, ajjhupagato”ti.
an10.93:17.1: “Yaṃ kho, bhante, kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ cetayitaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ tadaniccaṃ.
an10.93:17.3: ‘Yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, nameso attā’ti—
an10.93:17.5: Tassa ca uttari nissaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāmī”ti.
an10.93:18.1: Evaṃ vutte te paribbājakā tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyantā appaṭibhānā nisīdiṃsu.
an10.93:18.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati te paribbājake tuṇhībhūte maṅkubhūte pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.93:18.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yāvatako ahosi tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
an10.93:18.6: Evaṃ kho te, gahapati, moghapurisā kālena kālaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetabbā”ti.
an10.93:19.1: Atha kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
an10.93:19.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an10.93:20.1: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkante anāthapiṇḍike gahapatimhi bhikkhū āmantesi:
an10.93:20.2: “yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vassasatupasampanno imasmiṃ dhammavinaye, sopi evamevaṃ aññatitthiye paribbājake sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇheyya yathā taṃ anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā niggahitā”ti.
